smart_goals.description: Reduce daily carbohydrate intake to 45% of total caloric intake by the end of next month. Monitor and log daily carbohydrate intake using a food diary app.
Engage in 30 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity, such as brisk walking or cycling, at least 5 days per week until the end of the year.
Aim to maintain a daily water intake of 2 liters by the end of the next week. Monitor and log daily water intake using a hydration tracking app.
Maintain pre-meal blood glucose levels below 150 mg/dL and post-meal levels below 180 mg/dL daily by the end of the following month. Test blood glucose levels regularly using a glucometer.
Reduce sedentary behavior time to less than 6 hours per day by the end of the next month. Monitor and log sedentary behavior using a wearable device or smartphone app.
